structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(T). PALMER LAKE METROPOLITAN URBAN CENTER DISTRICT (PLMUC)

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.99.57. Organization of this article.
This Article is organized into three (3) primary sections:
The Regulating Plans allocate Sub-Districts and Street Types, which serve as the controlling plans for the district.
The Uses section provides for the various uses permitted by Sub-District.
The General Requirements are the instructions for implementing the Regulating Plans.
